formalpara.title: Evaluate the statistical test case results
formalpara.para: Evaluate the correctness of the software responses with respect to the behavior defined in the Function Specification.

glossdef.para: If failures are observed, evaluate their impact on the continuation of testing, experimental control, and the validity of certification results. If corrections are necessary, initiate the Engineering Change Process.

Document test results in the Statistical Testing Report. Record data for each failure, including the test environment, test case, test results, failure type and severity, and any other information that will assist in determining its cause.
